cards.tagline: Automate UI tasks with AI agents that click, scroll, and fill forms
cards.title: Google DeepMind Releases Gemini 2.5 Computer Use Model
tldr: Eliminates manual data entry by enabling AI to interact directly with web and mobile interfaces through automated clicks and form fills
Features screenshot-based workflow loops that execute UI actions with 70%+ accuracy and maintain context across multi-step processes
Includes built-in safety controls allowing developers to require human confirmation before high-stakes actions like payments or deletions
Real-world applications span CRM data transfers, sticky note organization, and behind-login automation for enterprise productivity gains

cards.tagline: Open-source Petri tool audits AI models for deception, power-seeking, and safety risks
cards.title: Anthropicâ€™s AI safety tool Petri uses autonomous agents to study model behavior
tldr: Eliminates manual safety testing burden by deploying autonomous agents that probe 14 leading LLMs across 111 risky tasks identifying misalignment behaviors automatically
Tests models across four critical safety categories including deception, power-seeking behavior, sycophancy patterns, and refusal failures with systematic audit trails
Features judge models that rank LLM responses across honesty and compliance dimensions flagging risky transcripts for human review and analysis
Represents shift from static benchmarks to ongoing automated audits catching dangerous behaviors before and after model deployment in production environments

cards.tagline: AI search optimization strategies boost ChatGPT rankings and brand visibility by 400%
cards.title: Blog - Superprompt.com
tldr: Addresses invisibility in AI search results by teaching citation engineering tactics that get brands mentioned in ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity responses
Features generative engine optimization frameworks that convert 5x better than traditional SEO by targeting AI recommendation patterns instead of keyword rankings
Includes brand mention tracking across 15+ AI platforms with real-time monitoring dashboards measuring visibility metrics and citation frequency changes
Demonstrates agentic AI customer service implementations achieving 93% resolution rates while cutting support costs 30% through autonomous agent workflows

cards.tagline: Laravel developers add AI chatbots, recommendation engines, and fraud detection with OpenAI integration
cards.title: How to Add AI Features to Laravel Apps in 2025
tldr: Solves customer support bottlenecks by deploying Laravel GPT chatbots that connect to FAQs, ticketing systems, and live data for instant contextual responses
Features recommendation engines using collaborative filtering that rank items per user in real-time improving retention through personalized content feeds
Includes NLP-powered intelligent search that parses intent and synonyms turning clunky keyword lookups into conversational queries with natural explanations
Fraud detection monitors login patterns, payment anomalies, and location changes using machine learning models that flag suspicious activity before damage occurs

cards.tagline: Build AI agents 70% faster with visual workflows and built-in guardrails
cards.title: Introducing AgentKit: Build Smarter AI Agents
tldr: Eliminates manual orchestration of agent logic, tool connections, and evaluation pipelines through unified visual workflow builder
Features drag-and-drop canvas, embedded chat UI, connector registry, and automated prompt optimization for rapid deployment
Includes safety guardrails with compliance validation, business rules enforcement, and human-in-loop approval workflows built-in
Real-world teams built procurement and work-assistant agents in hours instead of months using reusable modular components

cards.tagline: IBM watsonx delivers 500+ tools with governance layers for enterprise agent orchestration
cards.title: IBM unveils AI productivity tools across software and infrastructure ...
tldr: Addresses fragmented hybrid cloud environments through unified control plane that monitors multi-agent workflows with policy-based governance and real-time observability
Features AgentOps governance layer providing standardized reusable flows that sequence multiple agents while maintaining security compliance across mainframe and cloud systems
Integrates Anthropic Claude models directly into development environments enabling intelligent code generation, modernization, and security-first orchestration workflows
Project Bob IDE and watsonx Assistant for Z target infrastructure automation and proactive system management reducing bottlenecks across technology lifecycles

cards.tagline: ChatGPT integrates Spotify, Figma, and Canva directly into conversation workflows
cards.title: AI productivity tools Archives - The Daily Guardian
tldr: Eliminates app-switching friction by embedding productivity tools directly into ChatGPT enabling seamless creation and editing without leaving conversation context
Enables users to control music playback, design graphics, and create presentations through natural language commands integrated with third-party platforms
Represents shift toward unified AI workspace where multiple specialized tools respond to conversational prompts reducing cognitive load and workflow fragmentation
Integration capabilities demonstrate ChatGPT evolution from chatbot to orchestration layer that coordinates multiple productivity applications through single interface

cards.tagline: Enterprise ChatGPT training delivers policy-aware prompts and departmental adoption frameworks
cards.title: ChatGPT Enterprise for Business Training | Caltech CTME
tldr: Solves fragmented AI adoption by providing standardized prompt templates and guardrails that ensure compliance across finance, HR, and operations teams
Teaches repeatable frameworks for automating routine tasks like meeting agendas, transcripts, policy documentation, and executive summaries with brand consistency
Includes hands-on customization of ChatGPT Enterprise features like persistent instructions, custom GPTs, shared chats, and version control for team workflows
Participants leave with prompt reference guides, annotated workflows, custom onboarding GPT, and individualized automation plan for one business process
